formalpara.title: Result:
formalpara.para: When a host is refreshed and a new virtual machine is discovered on that host, CloudForms Management Engine checks to see if the virtual machine is already registered with another host. If this is the case, the host that the virtual machine is associated with switches to the new host. If the SmartProxy is monitoring a provider, this happens automatically. If not, the next refresh of the host addresses this.
